remarks: If an infinite set ` A ` is included in the underlying set of a finite cover ` B ` , then there exists a set of the cover that contains an infinite number of element of ` A ` .  (Contributed by FL, 2-Aug-2009.)
statement:
infssuni $p |- ( ( -. A e. Fin /\ B e. Fin /\ A C_ U. B ) -> E. x e. B -. ( A i^i x ) e. Fin ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
